meta_title: What Is Capital in Manufacturing? A Guide to Asset Lifecycle
meta_description: What is capital in an industrial context? We decode CapEx vs. OpEx, asset lifecycles, and how maintenance strategies impact Return on Net Assets (RONA).
title: What Is Capital? The Maintenance Manager’s Guide to Asset Value and ROI

hero_image.alt: Hero image for What Is Capital? The Maintenance Manager’s Guide to Asset Value and ROI

image_prompt: A photo-realistic, cinematic wide shot inside a modern, high-tech manufacturing facility. In the foreground, a diverse group of three industrial professionals (a maintenance manager in a white hard hat, a finance officer in a blazer holding a tablet, and a technician in high-vis gear) are standing around a large, complex automated assembly machine. They are engaged in a serious but collaborative discussion, pointing at a specific component of the machinery. The lighting is dramatic, highlighting the metallic textures of the equipment and the clean, organized nature of the plant. The background shows blurred motion of other automated lines, emphasizing a busy production environment. No text or overlays. 8k resolution.
